I'm glad you took another look..hey listen we all are learning here..that m=
essage was not solely to you..I never saw you try to correct anyone on what=
 they where hearing but some on here does ALOT...its starting to sound as i=
f they feel like they knew more then anyone and most just started doing thi=
s where..Frank,Steve and some other have been doing this for years..Some ev=
en have the nerve to try to talk done to Frank..now remember this is the ma=
n the made the box..so i just think its insulting and ignorant. I for one w=
ill be really pissed of if they ran him from his own group..

see what you mean. I mean no offense, but I it would be helpful to see some=
